name: Free cute chameleon game pack
description:
Free!! Cute chameleon gamepack for 2D sidescrollers and platformers.

_______________________________________

You will get

_______________________________________

  1. 2 PNG spritesheets 
  2. Illustrator file ( vector based images )

If you want a sharp image without loss of quality then use  the illustrator file to get the images in a very sharp state!

I have put alot of effort in this pack 😎If you like it comment me and follow me for more updates! :)

Feel free to use for commercial projects and modify the character if needed. Please use Hamstar If you want to credit me. Please do not resell the assets individually. Thank you!

_______________________________________

Follow & comment me to expand the asset pack

_______________________________________

If you really like this asset pack comment & follow me on itch to expand the pack with more assets !!!
